name: Lufthansa Full Flight | Boeing 737-500 | Frankfurt to Brussels
description:
A full length full flight video onboard Lufthansa Boeing 737-500 D-ABIX, operating flight LH1018 from Frankfurt (FRA) to Brussels (BRU) on 24 July 2014. 

The flight begins on stand in Frankfurt and is unique in that the entire flight is spent skirting around the numerous storms across Europe on this day.  Initially we head south out of Frankfurt to avoid weather before heading north towards Brussels, arriving after a flight time of 40 minutes.  The evening light made this a beautiful flight, in particular the approach and landing into Brussels over some beautiful countryside.

Video taken from seat 5F.


Map of Flight:  http://goo.gl/NtPNQg
Flight Details:  http://goo.gl/BIi4Uv

Please enjoy the flight and feel free to subscribe/comment!

GoPro Hero 3

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
